div.pre: 1655 Alexandria environs, 1908 (34) Burial: c. 330 B.C.? (Jenkins) Contents: 4 AV Lampsacus: st. Disposition: Jameson 1435, 1437-8, 2217 Edd√©, RassNum. 1909, p. 55 Regling, ZfN 1931, p. 28 Regling regards the other entries of Noe 34 as another hd. (no. 1683 below)
